content:
ModelProperty Class

In this Article

A ModelProperty represents a property on a ModelItem. Model properties are associated with an instance of an item, which allows them to have simple Value get/set properties instead of using the more cumbersome GetValue/SetValue mechanism of PropertyDescriptor.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class ModelProperty

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • ModelProperty

Inherited Members

Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

The value of a ModelProperty may come from a locally set value, or it may be inherited from somewhere higher up in the element hierarchy. Use the <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem.Source%2A> property of the value returned by Value to determine the source of the property value.

Constructors summary

ModelProperty()

Creates a new ModelProperty.

Properties summary

AttachedOwnerType

Returns the type that defines this property if stem.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.IsAttached* returns true; otherwise, returns null.
Attributes

Returns the attributes declared on this property.
Collection

Returns stem.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value* cast as a ModelItemCollection.
ComputedValue

Returns the currently computed value for this property. Setting a value on this property is the same as calling stem.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.SetValue*, but can be used in data binding expressions.
Converter

Returns the type converter to use with this property.
DefaultValue

Returns the default value for this property. If the property does not define a default value, this will return null.
Dictionary

Returns stem.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value* cast as a ModelItemDictionary. If the property value is not a dictionary, this property will return null.
IsAttached

Determines whether the property represents an attached property from a different type.
IsBrowsable

Determines whether the property can be shown in a property window.
IsCollection

Determines whether the value contained in the property is a ModelItemCollection.
IsDictionary

Determines whether the value contained in the property is a ModelItemDictionary.
IsReadOnly

Determines whether the property is read only.
IsSet

Determines whether the value of the property is set locally.
Name

Gets the name of this property.
Parent

Returns the parent of this property.
PropertyType

Returns the data type of the property.
Value

Returns the value set into this property.

Methods summary

ClearValue()

Clears the local value for the property.
Equals(Object)

Determines the equality for properties. Properties are equal if they have the same name and parent.
GetHashCode()

Serves as a hash function for a ModelProperty.
SetValue(Object)

Sets a local value on a property.

Operators summary

op_Equality(ModelProperty,ModelProperty)

Determines whether the properties are equal. Properties are equal if they have the same name and parent.
op_Inequality(ModelProperty,ModelProperty)

Determines whether the properties are unequal. Properties are equal if they have the same name and parent.

Constructors

  • ModelProperty()

    Creates a new ModelProperty.

    protected ModelProperty ();

Properties

  • AttachedOwnerType

    Returns the type that defines this property if stem.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.IsAttached* returns true; otherwise, returns null.

    public abstract Type AttachedOwnerType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      Returns a Type or null.

  • Attributes

    Returns the attributes declared on this property.

    public abstract System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection Attributes { get; }

    Property Value

    • AttributeCollection

      Returns the attributes as an AttributeCollection.

  • Collection

    Returns stem.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value* cast as a ModelItemCollection.

    public abstract System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection Collection { get; }

    Property Value

    • ModelItemCollection

      Returns the property value as a ModelItemCollection, or null.

    Remarks

    If the property value is not a collection, this property will return null.

  • ComputedValue

    Returns the currently computed value for this property. Setting a value on this property is the same as calling stem.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.SetValue*, but can be used in data binding expressions.

    public abstract object ComputedValue { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • System.Object

      Returns the computed value as an Object.

  • Converter

    Returns the type converter to use with this property.

    public abstract System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter Converter { get; }

    Property Value

    • TypeConverter

      Returns a TypeConverter for use with this property.

    Remarks

    Underlying type converters are all wrapped so they accept ModelItem objects. When performing a conversion to a particular value, the type converterâ€™s return type is not wrapped. Type converters that return standard values also return values as ModelItem objects.

  • DefaultValue

    Returns the default value for this property. If the property does not define a default value, this will return null.

    public abstract object DefaultValue { get; }

    Property Value

    • System.Object

      Returns an Object or null.

  • Dictionary

    Returns stem.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value* cast as a ModelItemDictionary. If the property value is not a dictionary, this property will return null.

    public abstract System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemDictionary Dictionary { get; }

    Property Value

    • ModelItemDictionary

      Returns a ModelItemDictionary or null.

  • IsAttached

    Determines whether the property represents an attached property from a different type.

    public abstract bool IsAttached { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property represents an attached property from a different type; otherwise, false.

  • IsBrowsable

    Determines whether the property can be shown in a property window.

    public abstract bool IsBrowsable { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property can be shown in a property window; otherwise, false.

  • IsCollection

    Determines whether the value contained in the property is a ModelItemCollection.

    public abstract bool IsCollection { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the value contained in the property is a ModelItemCollection; otherwise, false.

  • IsDictionary

    Determines whether the value contained in the property is a ModelItemDictionary.

    public abstract bool IsDictionary { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the value contained in the property is a stem.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItemDictionary; otherwise, false.

  • IsReadOnly

    Determines whether the property is read only.

    public abstract bool IsReadOnly { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property is read only; otherwise, false.

  • IsSet

    Determines whether the value of the property is set locally.

    public abstract bool IsSet { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the value of the property is set locally; otherwise, false.

  • Name

    Gets the name of this property.

    public abstract string Name { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of this property.

  • Parent

    Returns the parent of this property.

    public abstract System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem Parent { get; }

    Property Value

    • ModelItem

      Returns the parent of this property as a stem.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem.

  • PropertyType

    Returns the data type of the property.

    public abstract Type PropertyType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      Returns the Type of the property.

  • Value

    Returns the value set into this property.

    public abstract System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem Value { get; }

    Property Value

    • ModelItem

      Returns the property value as a ModelItem, or null.

    Remarks

    A property may return a value that is inherited further up the element hierarchy, in which case this property will return a value whose Source is not this. If no value has ever been set for the property Value will return null.

Methods

  • ClearValue()

    Clears the local value for the property.

    public abstract void ClearValue ();

    Remarks

    When there is no local value set for the property, a value may be inherited from higher in the property hierarchy. If you wish to set the value to null, call SetValue instead.

  • Equals(Object)

    Determines the equality for properties. Properties are equal if they have the same name and parent.

    public override bool Equals (object obj);

    Parameters

    • obj
      System.Object

      The property to compare with this property.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if obj is a ModelProperty that equals this property; otherwise, false.

  • GetHashCode()

    Serves as a hash function for a ModelProperty.

    public override int GetHashCode ();

    Returns

    • Int32

      Returns a hashcode as an Int32.

  • SetValue(Object)

    Sets a local value on a property.

    public abstract System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem SetValue (object value);

    Parameters

    • value
      System.Object

      The new value to set.

    Returns

    • ModelItem

      Returns value as a ModelItem.

    Remarks

    If value is not a ModelItem, it is wrapped in a <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem>, which is returned to the caller. It is valid to set value to null, in which case Value will be null. This is different from calling ClearValue.

    Note

    Using this method, the value will not be set on the underlying property until the editing context completes. To update the underlying property immediately, use Setter.

Operators

  • op_Equality(ModelProperty,ModelProperty)

    Determines whether the properties are equal. Properties are equal if they have the same name and parent.

    public static bool op_Equality (System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty first, System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty second);

    Parameters

    • first
      ModelProperty

      The first property.

    • second
      ModelProperty

      The second property.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the first property equals the second property; otherwise, false.

  • op_Inequality(ModelProperty,ModelProperty)

    Determines whether the properties are unequal. Properties are equal if they have the same name and parent.

    public static bool op_Inequality (System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty first, System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty second);

    Parameters

    • first
      ModelProperty

      The first property.

    • second
      ModelProperty

      The second property.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      false if the first property equals the second property; otherwise, true.
